mapper.insert: insert into manager (mql_ID, role_ID, manager_Name, manager_Psd, manager_Sex, Tel, Address, Comments) values (#{mqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager set role_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_Name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_Psd = #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_Sex = #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mql_ID = #{mqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mql_ID, role_ID, manager_Name, manager_Psd, manager_Sex, Tel, Address, Comments from manager
